Name: Komenan Mathieu
description:
Komenan Mathieu is a 33-year-old shopkeeper. He lives in CÃ´te d'Ivoire with his wife and 4 children.

He is asking for a loan to buy a solar kit consisting of 4 LED lamps, a rechargeable battery with a solar panel and a television in order to light his shop and enjoy the TV in the evening with his wife and children.

Having a solar kit with lights will also allow Komenan Mathieu to stay working longer in his shop when the daylight disappears.

Komenan Mathieu plans to expand his shop in the future.
